name: Descent of Divinity
title: Albedo: Descent of Divinity
desc: "The process of confirming the strategy for a duel also requires meticulous calculations..."
inPlayDescription: When you have Albedo on the field with this card equipped, if there is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Solar Isotoma on your side, your characters' <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Plunging Attack deals +1 DMG.

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Albedo to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc: <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Combat Action: When your active character is <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Albedo, equip this card.After Albedo equips this card, immediately use <span style="color:#FFD780FF">Abiogenesis: Solar Isotoma.When there is Albedo on the field who has this card equipped, if your side of the field has <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Solar Isotoma, then your characters' <span style="color:#FFFFFFFF">Plunging Attack deals +1 DMG.(You must have Albedo in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
